title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 11 ยง 47.0 - Purpose
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 11 ยง 47.0 - Purpose

State Regulations

The purpose of this Regulation is to permit life insurers who have elected or who elect an operative date of section 4221(k)(2) to issue individual life insurance policies to both men and women in New York with the same nonforfeiture benefits and the same reserve bases. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 11
ยง
47.0

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
